## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CorrelationBodyProperty(property)](./rest-stompjs.correlationbodyproperty.md) | All requests will now use correlation id as part of body |
|  [ParameterTransform(methodName)](./rest-stompjs.parametertransform.md) | Parameter descriptor that is used for transforming parameter before serialization |
|  [PublishQueue(name, options)](./rest-stompjs.publishqueue.md) | Assigns this method input to publish queue Only one publish per method! |
|  [PublishQueuePrefix(prefix)](./rest-stompjs.publishqueueprefix.md) | Sets prefix for publish queue |
|  [QueueCorrelation(options)](./rest-stompjs.queuecorrelation.md) | All requests and responses will now use correlation id as part of requet or response queue name |
|  [SubscribeQueue(name, options)](./rest-stompjs.subscribequeue.md) | Registers observable to specified queue, this observable is added to WebSocketClientResponse.output |
|  [SubscribeQueuePrefix(prefix)](./rest-stompjs.subscribequeueprefix.md) | Sets prefix for subscribe queue |
|  [UseSessionIdSuffix()](./rest-stompjs.usesessionidsuffix.md) | All requests and responses will now use session id suffix for all requests and responses |
|  [UseWebSocket()](./rest-stompjs.usewebsocket.md) | Sets StompJs to use WebSocket instead of SockJS |
|  [WebSocketHandleProducesType(source, metadata)](./rest-stompjs.websockethandleproducestype.md) |  |
|  [WebSocketHandleResultMiddlewareFactory(handleResultMiddlewares)](./rest-stompjs.websockethandleresultmiddlewarefactory.md) | Factory function for creating WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_RESULT\_MIDDLEWARE |
|  [WebSocketHandleStatusSubscribeMiddlewareFactory(handleStatusMiddlewares)](./rest-stompjs.websockethandlestatussubscribemiddlewarefactory.md) | Factory function for creating WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_STATUS\_SUBSCRIBE\_MIDDLEWARE |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Body](./rest-stompjs.body.md) | Body of a REST method, json stringify applied Only one body per method! |
|  [BodyProperty](./rest-stompjs.bodyproperty.md) | Value of parameter is assigned to body property with specified name |
|  [DEFAULT\_WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_RESULT\_MIDDLEWARE](./rest-stompjs.default_web_socket_handle_result_middleware.md) | Default web socket handle result middleware, multi providers are required for this token |
|  [DEFAULT\_WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_STATUS\_SUBSCRIBE\_MIDDLEWARE](./rest-stompjs.default_web_socket_handle_status_subscribe_middleware.md) | Default web socket handle status subscribe middleware, multi providers are required for this token |
|  [Path](./rest-stompjs.path.md) | Path variable of a method's url, type: string |
|  [WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_FILTER\_NON\_MATCHING\_PROVIDER](./rest-stompjs.web_socket_handle_filter_non_matching_provider.md) | Middleware provider used for filtering non matching results |
|  [WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_PRODUCES\_TYPE\_PROVIDER](./rest-stompjs.web_socket_handle_produces_type_provider.md) | Middleware provider used for handling produces type for result |
|  [WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_RESPONSE\_TRANSFORM\_PROVIDER](./rest-stompjs.web_socket_handle_response_transform_provider.md) | Middleware provider used for handling response transform |
|  [WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_RESULT\_MIDDLEWARE\_PROVIDER](./rest-stompjs.web_socket_handle_result_middleware_provider.md) | Provider for WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_RESULT\_MIDDLEWARE |
|  [WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_RESULT\_MIDDLEWARE](./rest-stompjs.web_socket_handle_result_middleware.md) | Web socket handle result middlewares, allows modification of default middlewares |
|  [WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_STATUS\_ERROR\_COMPLETE\_PROVIDER](./rest-stompjs.web_socket_handle_status_error_complete_provider.md) | Middleware provider used for handling status error and completition |
|  [WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_STATUS\_PROGRESS\_INDICATOR\_PROVIDER](./rest-stompjs.web_socket_handle_status_progress_indicator_provider.md) | Middleware provider used for handling status displaying progress indicator |
|  [WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_STATUS\_SUBSCRIBE\_MIDDLEWARE\_PROVIDER](./rest-stompjs.web_socket_handle_status_subscribe_middleware_provider.md) | Provider for WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_STATUS\_SUBSCRIBE\_MIDDLEWARE |
|  [WEB\_SOCKET\_HANDLE\_STATUS\_SUBSCRIBE\_MIDDLEWARE](./rest-stompjs.web_socket_handle_status_subscribe_middleware.md) | Web socket handle status subscribe middlewares, allows modification of default middlewares |
